# Jyovika Aswale: Analytics Portfolio

This repository contains a curated collection of data analysis projects written in R and published through Quarto. Each project focuses on clear statistical reasoning, polished visualisation, and insights that connect data to real decision making.

I use this portfolio to demonstrate my approach to analysis:

  - Start with exploration, understand how the data behaves, choose suitable models, test assumptions, communicate uncertainty, and present results in a way that anyone can understand.

An R powered exploration of Formula 1 data

  - Sensitivity analysis to compare team performance
  
  - Custom colour palettes and visual styling
